function handler({

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-06 09:38:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>2895dfa4ff60711019f1e11a1b3d48e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setAdditionalDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KS Investment Requests" source="x_557984_ks_inve_0">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="KS Investment Requests">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2895dfa4ff60711019f1e11a1b3d48e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-06 09:38:02</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
